name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Sab Rango)
description:
Gameplay Instructions:

Navigation 

1) jog in a stayed position , if you want to increase moving speed, open the menu by left secondary button and change the speed value by left pointer finger

2) to snap  turn, use left thumb stick

3) if you want to move by joystick change the settings by menu button (right secondary button Y ) and use left thumbstick

4) use right secondary button (B) to toggle your weapon

Sounds that was used :

Obscura | 1 hour of Dark Ambient Fantasy Music by ASKII

The Road Home", by Alexander Nakarada

Locomotion system "Bony Labyrinth" https://u3d.as/2AQT
